Texts.Eng: Specialized Gels

Texts.Chs:
^orange;0级^reset;

你在大地守护团学院的四年训练，教会了你基本的生存技能，使你在碰撞事故中能够长时间存活。这包括基本的化学知识。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 0^reset;

Your training, thanks to four years in the Protectorate Academy, provides you with basic survival skills to keep you alive for extended periods in the event of a crash. This includes basic chemistry knowledge.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

化学是个美妙的领域，其中包括了许多实际应用，如塑料、炸弹、医药、化肥或生物柴油的制造。随着你可以在你的^orange;加工台^reset;处制造^orange;炼金台^reset;，你现在准备开始探索化学的潜力。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

Chemistry is a wonderful field with many practical applications such as the creation of plastics, bombs, medicine, fertilizer or biodiesel. With the ability to make an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; at your ^orange;Machining Table^reset;, you're now ready to start exploring its potential.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

也许最经典的化学反应之一就是某种东西正在发生爆炸。现在，你可以根据需要通过一些简单的爆炸物来帮助你开采。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

Perhaps one of the most classic chemical reactions is something going boom. Now, you can make that happen on demand with some neat new explodables to help you mine.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经开始学习如何用化学物质制造有用的农作物生长辅助剂，现在可以在你的^orange;炼金台^reset;处制造基础化肥，硫酸铵可以从许多来源提取。试着磨碎一些星核碎片或者在你的手磨里磨点屎。你需要一个^orange;生长托盘^reset;来使用你的化肥 - 如果你只是用锄头和浇水罐从地里种植植物，那化肥对你没有任何用处。

^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了在实验室里制造纯碳块和几种不同的化合物，这些化合物对农业和医学都很有用。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to make chunks of pure carbon in your lab and a couple different compounds that will be useful in agriculture and medicine.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

有了新发现的化学知识，你现在可以合成从被杀死的敌人那里获得的各种元素化合。你也可以创造更先进的晶体。不过，你得先把炼金台升级为^orange;化学操作台^reset;。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

With your newfound chemistry knowledge, you can now create various elemental compounds that would normally be obtained from slain foes. You can also create more advanced crystals. You'll have to upgrade to a ^orange;Chemistry Lab^reset; first, though.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你可以用更复杂的化学物质制造更好的花费。你的植物会以更快的生长速度和更高的产量来回报你。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make even better fertilizer using more complex chemicals. Your plants will thank you with faster growth and more yields.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经学会了如何从有机物中制造燃料，可以用来为各种发电机、飞船引擎和机甲提供燃料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned how to make fuel out of organic matter, which can be used to fuel various generators, ship engines and mechs.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经学会了创造一种简单灵活的塑料材料，这种材料对于电子产品和可穿戴设备的创造尤有帮助。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to create a simple, flexible plastic material that is especially helpful in the creation of electronics and wearables.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你对液体创造和生物燃料的综合知识使你设计出一种增强的高效机械燃料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Your combined knowledge of fluid creation and biofuel has led to you designing an enhanced, efficient fuel for use in mechs.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

通过使用塑料制造炸药，你不仅可以更安全地携带更大更致命的炸弹，而且可以轻松地调整炸药的形状，使其在爆炸时更有效。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

By using plastic in the creation of explosives, you can not only more safely contain bigger and deadlier bombs, but also easily shape your charges to make them more effective when they blow.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

石墨烯是有史以来最神奇的物质之一，现在你知道如何自己制造它了。一个单原子厚的六角形石墨片，石墨烯海枯石烂都保持着稳定。石墨烯不仅是许多强大武器和装甲的关键组成部分，在创造复杂电路方面也非常有用。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Graphene is one of the most wonderful substances ever created, and now you know how to make it yourself. A one-atom thick sheet of hexagonal graphite, graphene is ridiculously durable. In addition to being a key component in many powerful weapons and armor, graphene is also very useful in the creation of complex circuitry.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

学习了很多关于塑料制造的知识，你现在可以制造一种更加强大的刚性塑料非常耐用和耐热。高级塑料是许多东西的关键成分，但你几乎不可能一直都有足够的存货。幸运的是，你已经学会了几种不同的方法来制造这种物质，尽管你可能大部分时候都是从汽油中提取。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Having learned a lot about plastic creation, you can now create a much more potent rigid plastic that is extremely durable and quite heat-proof. Advanced Plastic is a key ingredient in tons of things, and you can almost never have enough. Luckily, you've learned of several different ways to make this substance, though you'll probably be deriving it from petrol most of the time.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你现在可以在你的实验室里设计高级细胞和诱变样本，这些物质在生物武器和植物设计中特别有用。同时你也可是制作和利用奇异的生物软泥。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You are now able to engineer advanced cells and mutagenic samples in your lab that are especially useful in bioweapons and plant design as well as craft and utilize bizarre biological slimes.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经开发出一些奇怪的凝胶，它们在黑暗中发光，可以使任何接触到它们的物体加速到高速。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've developed some weird gels that glow in the dark and can accelerate anything that touches them to a high speed.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了如何从有机物中制造燃料，可以用来为各种发电机、飞船引擎和机甲提供燃料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned how to make fuel out of organic matter, which can be used to fuel various generators, ship engines and mechs.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你不仅掌握了植物化肥，还掌握了杀虫剂的制造。只是在吃之前一定要洗干净。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've mastered not just plant fertilization, but also the making of pesticides. Just make sure to wash it before you eat it.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经研究过像植物一样培养水晶的厄休安艺术，现在你可以自己这样做了。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've studied the Eld'uukhar art of growing crystals like plants and can now do so yourself.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你的医学知识增长了不少，你现在可以制造出更好的治疗物品了。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Your medical knowledge has grown quite a bit. You're able to make superior healing items.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

原来所有的爆炸知识除了让东西爆炸之外还有其他好处: 让什么东西都容易爆炸。不稳定粒子是发展核技术的关键。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Turns out all that explosives knowledge was good for something besides making things explode: making things _prone_ to exploding. Unstable Particles are crucial in developing nuclear technology.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你可以在你的实验室里制造更复杂的液体。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can make even more complicated liquids at your lab.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你已经学会了如何从有机物中制造燃料，可以用来为各种发电机、飞船引擎和机甲提供燃料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've learned how to make fuel out of organic matter, which can be used to fuel various generators, ship engines and mechs.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你已经学会了如何在化学中混合活性物质和金属来做一些奇怪的事情。你可以在你的实验室生产有用的外星化合物和寂灭矿。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've learned how to mix living material and metals in chemistry to do some bizarre things. You can produce useful Alien Compound and Quietus Ore in your lab.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

毫不夸张地说，你是全宇宙最好的医生之一。你可以制造治愈万物的治疗物品，可以治愈任何伤口。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

It's no exaggeration to say that you're one of the best medics in the galaxy. You can craft impossibly potent healing items which can cure any wound.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

通常，这种东西只能在气态巨行星的深处找到，但是你找到了一种方法，可以在你的实验室里自己制造。金属氢是一种强大的超导体，也是一种神奇的燃料来源。此外，你还发现武器化不稳定粒子的最佳方法——把它和金属氢结合起来，制造具有荒谬破坏力的手榴弹。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Normally, this stuff is only found in the depths of gas giants, but you found a way to make it in your lab by yourself. Metallic Hydrogen is a powerful superconductor, and an amazing fuel source. Also, you found the best way to weaponize Unstable Particles - by combining them with Metallic Hydrogen to build ridiculously destructive grenades.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你对细胞的了解非常广泛，你现在可以制造更多奇怪的细胞和诱变样本。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Your knowledge of cells is vast. You can make even more strange cells and mutagenic samples.
